alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:26PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms and outflow winds will impact portions of northeastern Juab... southwestern Box Elder...southwestern Salt Lake...southwestern Utah and eastern Tooele Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 425 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms and outflow winds along a line extending from 26 miles west of Utah Test and Training Range North to near Knolls to 9 miles northwest of Skull Valley to Vernon to 18 miles west of Elberta. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Dugway English Village, Eagle Mountain, Stansbury Park, Cedar Fort, Vernon, Ophir, Delle, Tooele Army Depot, Clive, Knolls, Tooele Army Depot South, Utah Test and Training Range North, Skull Valley, Elberta, Camp Williams, Bingham Canyon Mine, Utah Lake and Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 32 and 98. US Route 6 between mile markers 137 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
